name: Chuck Lagarce’s Pasta/shrimp
instructions: Butter and garlic in frying pan
6 plum tomatoes,  seeds out, cut small, cook in butter and garlic until saucy
Throw in some ground up fresh basil and parsley
Make Parma Rosa Sauce, (double the butter) and add it to the tomato sauce
Blanche bunch of asparagus , cut in 1” pieces
Cook shrimp in butter & garlic sauce ,  put in shredded lobster tail meat
Add shrimp or lobster to parmesan sauce
Cook 2 packages of bow tie pasta
